name: Adventures with Clancy of the Overflow
name_original: Adventures with Clancy of the Overflow
description:
For the Australian Bushfire Charity Jam.

If you cut this game open, it would bleed Vegemite.  See classic artwork, read famous poems,  and even find a recipe for damper!  All while exploring New South Wales, Victoria and Tasmania.

Assets were all created before my time; this is a celebration of Australia.  All artwork and poetry are out of copyright.
